page.title: 03Home life in the area
page.content: Some of the pople of the area find employment in the local Milk Marketing Board factory, in the Saint David's Mental Hospital and the West Wales Hospital Glangwile. There are a large number of civil servants who work in the offices of the administrative centre in Carmarthen. The women of the area are often members of the Women's Institute. The younger members of the community, both girls and boys, belong to the young Farmers' Club of which there is a flourishing group in Carmarthen. There is a leisure centre in Johnstown which is used by a large number who reach it by car.
